my_colors <- reactive({
  display.brewer.all()$name
})

ui <- fluidPage(
  sidebarLayout(
    sidebarPanel(
      selectInput("color_palette", "Paleta de colores", choices = my_colors())
    ),
    mainPanel(
      plotOutput("heatmap_plot")
    )
  )
)

server <- function(input, output) {
  output$heatmap_plot <- renderPlot({
    my_colors_selected <- brewer.pal(n = 11, name = input$color_palette)
    my_colors_selected <- colorRampPalette(my_colors_selected)(50)
    my_colors_selected <- rev(my_colors_selected)
    
    pheatmap(EiMybs_log2_filtrado, scale = "row", color = my_colors_selected, border_color = NA, fontsize_row = 6)
  })
}

shinyApp(ui = ui, server = server)
